tool.name: Split a imzML file into smaller files with i2nca
tool.description: Split an imzML file into different smaller flies based on a ROI annoation.
tool.command:
cp "${infile.extra_files_path}/imzml" indata.imzML && cp "${infile.extra_files_path}/ibd" indata.ibd &&
mkdir outdata &&
'i2nca_file_splitter' 'indata.imzML' 'outdata/outdata_' '$tsv_annotation' &&
ls -l outdata

param.name: infile
param.label: MSI data
param.help: Load the .imzml file on which the QC should be performed

param.name: tsv_annotation
param.label: ROI annotation as tsv file
param.help: Load a .tsv file for ROI annoation. \n This file needs three columns with 'x', 'y' and 'annotation'. Please use the origin (0|0) to refence the pixel coordinates.
